name: The Power of Love
description: Q has left you on the edge of your seat, wondering if he will remove the concept of love from the universe. Have you convinced him, or will you need to expand your arguments?
rules:
-- Unique Augment, Bajoran, and Ferengi Alliance Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Soren, Salia, L. Troi, Lothario Q, or Scoundrel crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Soren, Salia, L. Troi, Lothario Q, or Scoundrel
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Miller
featured_crew.flavor: Cancelling his wedding with Deanna, Wyatt joins the Tarellians in the hopes of helping them find a cure to the virus that has nearly wiped out their civilization.

action.name: What I Want Is To Cure People

featured_crew.name: Salia
featured_crew.flavor: Born to parents of rival factions, Salia is destined to unite her people as a neutral ruler.

action.name: Let's Not Say Goodbye Like This

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

screens.text: "Your arguments in favor of love have convinced me... that humans are as puerile and small-minded as ever. Get your X's and O's in while you can, Captain."
"Are you surprised? You really shouldn't be. Love is so much more than the trappings of romance and marriage and children."

"If you want to change that man's mind, you'll need to show him that love is transformative! Love is boundless! Love is inspirational! And what we have accomplished for the love of others is worth all the heartache it might give us."
